HDG.ID.content: man obviously (offenbar) is a being [presumption of beings], so he belongs to totality (Ganze) of Being, to be in the order (eingeordnet) of Being > man is unique: being who thinks, open to Being, face to face w/ Being, referred to being, answers to it > man is essentially this relationship (Bezug) of responding (Entsprechung) to Being, he is only this > this “only (nur)” is not a limitation (Beschränkung), is an excess (Übermass) [surplus] > man lets Being arrive as presence, such becoming present needs (braucht) openness of a clearing, and by this need (Brauchen) remains appropriated (übereignet) to human being [Being needs man]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.ID.linkedContent: man obviously (offenbar) is a being [presumption of beings], so he belongs to totality (Ganze) of Being, to be in the order (eingeordnet) of Being > man is unique: being who thinks, open to Being, face to face w/ Being, referred to being, answers to it > man is essentially this relationship (Bezug) of responding (Entsprechung) to Being, he is only this > this “only (nur)” is not a limitation (Beschränkung), is an excess (Übermass) [surplus] > man lets Being arrive as presence, such becoming present needs (braucht) openness of a clearing, and by this need (Brauchen) remains appropriated (übereignet) to human being [Being needs man]

HDG.ID.content: step back moves out of metaphysics into essential nature of metaphysics, step out of dominance (Herrschaft) of technology & its description of the atomic age > “whither” to which we step only shows itself in the step, must be ventured in face of beings as such and as a whole [beyond beings?], step back requires duration & endurance we don’t know [go beyond, then, Derrida]

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.ID.linkedContent: step back moves out of metaphysics into essential nature of metaphysics, step out of dominance (Herrschaft) of technology & its description of the atomic age > “whither” to which we step only shows itself in the step, must be ventured in face of beings as such and as a whole [beyond beings?], step back requires duration & endurance we don’t know [go beyond, then, Derrida]

HDG.ID.content: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance
HDG.ID.linkedContent: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance

HDG.BT.content: in investigations where thing is deeply veiled, don’t overestimate results: constantly face possibility of disclosing an even more primordial/universal horizon from which to draw answer to question: “What is Being?” [Seinsfrage] > must reawaken question of Being before achieving positive results, arrive at a field where we can come to terms w/ it in a way that can be controlled [totally other—then teleological control?]
HDG.BT.linkedContent: in investigations where thing is deeply veiled, don’t overestimate results: constantly face possibility of disclosing an even more primordial/universal horizon from which to draw answer to question: “What is Being?” [Seinsfrage] > must reawaken question of Being before achieving positive results, arrive at a field where we can come to terms w/ it in a way that can be controlled [totally other—then teleological control?]

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy
HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy

HDG.LP.content: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man
HDG.LP.linkedContent: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]

motif.name: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP
motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.LP.content: poet only becomes poet as he follows “madman” [stranger], calls to the brother who follows him [?] > friend’s face (Antlizt) looks into face of stranger: Augenblick [instant] of this glance moves the Sage of the listener

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [on demands for and against types of presuppositions: cries of anxiety in face of philosophy]

HDG.OHF.content: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)
